title: New York Firm Recalls Beef Product Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, January 12, 2015 US Foods, a Blasdell, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 700 pounds of beef product due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains peanuts, known allergens which are...
